H0.text: what countries does the arctic circle run through. Norway

H1.text: what countries does the arctic circle run through. Canada

H2.text: what countries does the arctic circle run through. Russia

H3.text: what countries does the arctic circle run through. North Greenland

A4.text: The land within the Arctic Circle is divided among eight countries: Norway, Sweden, Finland, Russia, the United States (Alaska), Canada (Yukon, Northwest Territories, and Nunavut), Denmark (Greenland), and Iceland.
